title: Energy Medicine and Touch Therapy — Pacific Integrative and Functional Medicine
cleaned_text: Reiki Reiki, a system of energy healing that originated in Japan. It is a method where the universal healing energy is channelized through a practitioner to the receiver to improve overall health and wellness. It is considered an excellent technique to de-stress and hence is becoming increasingly popular in today's lifestyle. People have experienced an enhancement of the quality of their life through regular Reiki sessions. The knowledge that "life force energy" flows through all living beings and it is the sole property that has a capacity to heal, is strongly believed by a Reiki practitioner. It is considered as one of the most sacred healing practices in existence.
